Rank.Description: Increases damage by 2%
Increases damage by 4%
Increases damage by 6%
Blade buffs gain an additional 3% chance to hit.
Blade buffs gain an additional 6% chance to hit.
Blade buffs gain an additional 9% chance to hit.
Blade buffs gain an additional 12% chance to hit.
Blade buffs gain an additional 15% chance to hit.
Unlocks the Windspear ability.
Your non-finisher ability attacks have a 33% chance to deal an additional 3% of your Attack Power as Air damage.
Your non-finisher ability attacks have a 66% chance to deal an additional 3% of your Attack Power as Air damage.
Your non-finisher ability attacks have a 100% chance to deal an additional 3% of your Attack Power as Air damage.
Non Physical attacks ignore 2% of the target’s Resists.
Non Physical attacks ignore 4% of the target’s Resists.
Non Physical attacks ignore 6% of the target’s Resists.
Non Physical attacks ignore 8% of the target’s Resists.
Non Physical attacks ignore 10% of the target’s Resists.
When struck in Melee combat, there is a 10% chance that the enemy will be hit for 6% of Attack Power as Fire damage.
When struck in Melee combat, there is a 20% chance that the enemy will be hit for 6% of Attack Power as Fire damage.
When struck in Melee combat, there is a 30% chance that the enemy will be hit for 6% of Attack Power as Fire damage.
Reduces incoming damage from non Physical attacks by 2%. Increases non Physical damage by 2%.
Reduces incoming damage from non Physical attacks by 4%. Increases non Physical damage by 4%.
Reduces incoming damage from non Physical attacks by 6%. Increases non Physical damage by 6%.
Reduces incoming damage from non Physical attacks by 8%. Increases non Physical damage by 8%.
Reduces incoming damage from non Physical attacks by 10%. Increases non Physical damage by 10%.

Ability.Description: Builders have a 25% chance to heal the Warrior 20% of Attack Power. Only 1 blade spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Blade of Elemental Affinity ability.

Ability.Description: Spear abilities hit up to 5 enemies but deal 50% less damage.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Fork ability.
Reduces the threat generated by damage effects by 25%. Increases damage by 2%.
Reduces the threat generated by damage effects by 50%. Increases damage by 4%.
Increases Avatar of Wind to 13%, Avatar of Water to 7%, Avatar of Flame damage by 10%, Avatar of the Rift to 20%.
Increases Avatar of Wind to 16%, Avatar of Water to 10%, Avatar of Flame damage by 20%, Avatar of the Rift to 25%.
Increase Damage of Bursts and Scald by 8%
Increase Damage of Bursts and Scald by 16%
Increase Damage of Bursts and Scald by 24%
Increase Damage of Bursts and Scald by 32%
Increase Damage of Bursts and Scald by 40%
Grants a 25% chance that the Power cost of your next Attack Point generating ability is reduced by 25% on a successful hit.
Grants a 50% chance that the Power cost of your next Attack Point generating ability is reduced by 25% on a successful hit.

Ability.Description: Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Rank.Description: Unlocks Stoneshield ability.
Increases Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to Burst attacks by 40%. Power cost of Burst attacks is reduced by 40%.
Increases the damage done by Elemental Touch by 50%.
Increases the damage done by Elemental Touch by 100%.
Reduce the Power cost of Teleports by 50%. Increases the damage of all Finishers by 5%.
Increase duration on Rift Storm by 1 second.
Increase duration on Rift Storm by 2 seconds.
Hitting with a Burst ability increases the damage of non Physical attacks by 10% for 6 seconds.
Hitting with a Burst ability increases the damage of non Physical attacks by 20% for 6 seconds.

Ability.Description:
Applies Rift Storm to the Warrior, dealing additional Air damage per Attack Point over 6s to up to 5 enemies:
1 Point: 1077 damage. 2 Points: 1625 damage. 3 Points: 2453 damage.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Storm ability.
Enemies damaged by Icy Burst while under the effects of Fiery Burst take 3%, 6%, or 9% of Attack Power as Air Damage based on Attack Points used.
Enemies damaged by Icy Burst while under the effects of Fiery Burst take 6%, 12%, or 18% of Attack Power as Air Damage based on Attack Points used.
Increases the range of Teleports by 3 meters, and Elemental damage by 5%.
Increases the range of Teleports by 6 meters, and Elemental damage by 10%.
Unlocks the Rift Barrage ability.

Ability.Description: Ability hits have a 20% chance to deal 689 Fire damage back to the attacker. Only 1 Avatar spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Avatar of Flame ability.
Increases Critical Hit Damage and Critical Hit chance by 2%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage and Critical Hit chance by 4%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage and Critical Hit chance by 6%.

Ability.Description: Debuffs the enemy, causing any elemental attacks from the Warrior to apply Implosion Surge to the enemy. After 8s, deals 1393 Air damage, increased by 15% per Implosion Surge on the Enemy, maximum of 5. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Implosion ability.

Ability.Description:
Causes the Warrior's next attack ability to deal additional Fire damage per Attack Point over 15s. Lasts 15s:
1 Point: 718 damage. 2 Points: 1083 damage. 3 Points: 1635 damage.

Rank.Description: Unlocks Fiery Burst ability.
Increases the amount Frost Strike enhances Elemental Strike damage by 10%.
Increases the amount Frost Strike enhances Elemental Strike damage by 20%.

AbilityRank.Description: Teleports to the target location.
Your next burst has 3 charges instead of 1.
Base Damage is increased by 1% for each Point spent in the Riftblade Soul.
Spear abilities hit up to 5 enemies but deal 50% less damage.

Grants Storm Blade, Blade of Elemental Affinity, Planar Blade, and Blade of the Ascended which reduces the Power cost of non Physical Finishers by 2 and the damage of Riftblade abilities by 30%. Lasts 1h.
Stuns up to 8 enemies for 3s.
Ability hits have a 20% chance to deal 689 Fire damage back to the attacker. Only 1 Avatar spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.
Deals 1664 to 1839 Air damage to the target and up to 8 enemies along the path of the projectile. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Debuffs the enemy, causing any elemental attacks from the Warrior to apply Implosion Surge to the enemy. After 8s, deals 1393 Air damage, increased by 15% per Implosion Surge on the Enemy, maximum of 5. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Deals 2337 Fire damage over 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Ability hits have a 25% chance to refresh Riftwalk and Rift Travel. Increases the damage of Riftblade abilities by 10%. Only 1 blade spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1h.
Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.
Deals 1064 to 1177 Water damage. Increases elemental Strike damage by 10% for 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

The Warrior's weapon is coated in Ice for 15 seconds. The next attack ability that hits deals extra Water damage:
1 Point: 513 damage. 2 Points: 774 damage. 3 Points: 1168 damage.

Causes the Warrior's next attack ability to deal additional Fire damage per Attack Point over 15s. Lasts 15s:
1 Point: 718 damage. 2 Points: 1083 damage. 3 Points: 1635 damage.

Applies Rift Storm to the Warrior, dealing additional Air damage per Attack Point over 6s to up to 5 enemies:
1 Point: 1077 damage. 2 Points: 1625 damage. 3 Points: 2453 damage.
Deals 749 to 828 Air damage to up to 5 enemies. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Reduces damage taken by 5%. Only 1 Avatar spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1h.
Builders have a 25% chance to heal the Warrior 20% of Attack Power. Only 1 blade spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1h.
Enhances Elemental Ability damage by 15%, in addition to reducing the Power cost of Elemental Builders by 2. Only 1 Avatar spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1h.
Teleports to behind the enemy. Deals 316 to 349 Air damage. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Causes the Warrior's next attack ability to deal additional Air damage per Attack Point to up to 5 enemies. Affected enemies lose 10% of their Mana, 10 Energy or 10 Power. Lasts 15s:
1 Point: 520 damage. 2 Points: 785 damage. 3 Points: 1185 damage.
Increases Dodge by 3% and movement speed by 10%. Lasts 1h.
Stuns the target for 3s.
Finishers gain a bonus to Attack Power contribution based on how many Attack Points were consumed.
Non-finisher ability hits have a 25% chance to deal 172 Air damage. Only 1 blade spell can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.

Causes the Warrior's next attack ability to deal additional Earth damage per Attack Point to up to 5 enemies. Lasts 15s:
1 Point: 520 damage. 2 Points: 785 damage. 3 Points: 1185 damage.
Deals 1248 to 1380 Fire damage. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Interrupts
Deals 2220 to 2453 Air damage. Increases the Warrior's non Physical damage by 25% for 20s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
